Text: Far be it from me to jump into conclusions, but this looks real crap, specially the film poster with the naked guys
looks like he has a Hollywood brain...just declaring a movie bad because of the poster...it actually sounds interesting...lets hope I do not get disappointed..
bad poster+worse move=some retard fucked up a legendary classic and made me want to shoot myself. so i will go out on a limb and say that swine is dead on.

A/V 9/9
Movie: This American thought it was very funny and smart!
